# Component Wrapping Options

**API Collection**

The wrapping option specifies overflow behavior for calendar components in calendrical calculations

## Overview

The wrapping option specifies overflow behavior for calendar components in calendrical calculations—see [doc://com.apple.corefoundation/documentation/CoreFoundation/CFCalendarAddComponents] and [doc://com.apple.corefoundation/documentation/CoreFoundation/CFCalendarGetComponentDifference].

## Constants

- **kCFCalendarComponentsWrap**: Specifies that the components specified for calendar components should be incremented and wrap around to zero/one on overflow, but should not cause higher units to be incremented.

## Constants

- **CFCalendarUnit**: CFCalendarUnit constants are used to specify calendrical units, such as day or month, in various calendar calculations.
